title: Singapore Bonds Break From Treasuries as Haven Demand Grows
description: Singapore sovereign-bond sensitivity to Treasuries has declined, an indication that investors are looking for alternatives to dollar assets.
content: Singapore sovereign-bond sensitivity to Treasuries has declined, an indication that investors are looking for alternatives to dollar assets.
